RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the department: United States Department of Homeland Security

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: involved in the stop of RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.; considered the behavior of vehicles' drivers in determining reasonable suspicion to stop; followed suspicious vehicles for approximately five minutes; conducted a roving stop; familiar with most vehicles on Farm-to-Market Road 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Department of Homeland Sec: received information regarding attempted alien smuggling events; conducted interviews at the Freer immigration checkpoint
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: held a hearing on the pending motions to suppress and considered factors for reasonable suspicion
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Court: governing body for traffic stops and arrests, applying principles set out in Terry
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Officer Reymundo Reyes: conducted a traffic stop of IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR., noticed he was nervous and shaking during the interaction; issued a citation and impounded the black Dodge pickup truck due to unclear ownership and lack of insurance information; cooperated with United States Border Patrol during the traffic stop
